name: Monkey Money Slots Deluxe
description:
The cheeky monkey grins his way to huge virtual wins in Monkey Money Slots Deluxe for iPad, the most fun jungle themed slot machine simulation on the planet!

3 or more scattered bananas will start the Jungle Feature free games.

3 or more scattered butterflies during normal play OR free games will start the Butterfly Bonus round where you can win one of 11 different bonuses!

Fantastic additional features include the "Coconut Feature" - race against other monkeys to climb a tree and win free games.

The Jungle Jackpot is an awesome challenge - cross the jungle to win the jackpot, but watch out for boulders! Win more by opening bonus crates along the way.

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
